a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The index combines expert estimates with data on violence against journalists. It ranges from 0-100 (no freedom).
Note: Good = 0–15 points; Satisfactory = 15–25; Problematic = 25–35; Difficult = 35–55; Very serious = 55–100.
